T17n958u_001:9: eṣāṃ madhye tu kiñjalke vidyate parameśvaraḥ |
T17n958u_001:12: ata eva samudbhūtāḥ sarvamantrāstu dehinām || (va. ti., pṛ. 73-74)
T17n958u_001:18: yāvallaukikabhāvabhedamanantaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇiti sarvo'yaṃ varṇādyaprabhava iti | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 71)
T17n958u_001:20: svanikāyaprasiddhyā tu pañca vidyāsthānānyāśritya vartate'kāraḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 72)
T17n958u_001:21: aṣṭabhirvargairveṣṭito'sau paramākṣaro'kāra eva samastamantrahetuḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 74-75)
T17n958u_001:23: nirvāṇena tuccharūpeṇa sahitaṃ bimbaṃ saṃsāreṇa kṣarasukhalakṣaṇenātītamanāsravamahāsukhamakṣaram | (se. ṭī. pṛ. 70)
T17n958u_001:25: kiñcid grāhyādiśūnyaṃ cet cittamakṣobhyamucyate | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 29)
T17n958u_001:30: akṣobhyaḥ kleśairna kṣubhyata iti kṛtvā | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 19a)
T17n958u_001:33: ākāśavaccittaṃ yasya sa ākāśacitto'kṣobhyaḥ suviśuddhadharmadhātusvabhāvatvāt | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 51)
T17n958u_001:34: rāgādibhirakṣobhyaḥ sa eva | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 85)
T17n958u_001:37: dhanvākāre ca vṛtte tvanudinahavane cābdhikoṇe ca kūṇḍe |
T17n958u_001:39: yasmin sūryo na vidyutpatiśaśadharo na grahāstārakādyāḥ || (kā. ta. 2.36)
T17n958u_001:43: tadā vaśyākarṣaṇaṃ kuryāt | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 143)
T17n958u_001:44: sthitastrikaṭideśe tu trikoṇe jvalanastathā | (va. ti., pṛ. 61)
T17n958u_001:55: saṃcintya yadacintyaṃ vai tadacintyaṃ bhavannahi || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 20,30)
T17n958u_001:58: yo dhāturniścito na cittagamanīyo na cittaprameyo na cittacetanayā prativeditavyaḥ,
T17n958u_001:73: yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so'pramattaḥ || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 25)
T17n958u_001:99: tyaktaṃ cittaṃ ca caitanyaṃ tadadvayajñānamuttamam || (a. kra. 51-52)
T17n958u_001:111: sattvārthamā saṃsāraṃ kurvantu bhagavantaḥ saṃbuddhāstatsutā api mahābodhisattvāstiṣṭhantu māmā parinirvāṇāditi | (sā. mā., pṛ. 56)
T17n958u_001:112: jagadarthamā saṃsāraṃ kurvanto bhagavantastathāgatāstatsutā api tiṣṭhantu māṃ parinirvāntviti | (sā. mā., pṛ. 202)
T17n958u_001:114: aparimitasattvadhātoryathāśayavaśena saṃvṛtiparamārthavibhāgena paramaguhyavajrayāna deśanārthamanujñābhiṣeko buddhatvaniṣpādakaḥ saptamaḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 21)
T17n958u_001:117: tasmin manomayakāyasya praveśo'nutpādaprayogaḥ | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 31)
T17n958u_001:120: anusmṛtiriti jñeyaṃ pratibhāsastatra jāyate || (se. ṭī., pṛ. 30)
T17n958u_001:134: virāgād rāgavigamāduṣṇīṣasthaṃ yat saukhyaṃ śukraṃ tatpratiṣṭhitam |
T17n958u_001:137: ata eva mahārāgo'kṣaraśca prādhānyāt prabhyustraidhātukeśvaraḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 55)
T17n958u_001:146: so'nimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim || (he. ta. ṭī., pṛ. 5a)
T17n958u_001:159: tadavadhau pāke cābhimukhyāt | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 28)
T17n958u_001:171: tatra garbhajotpattikrameṇa mātāpitrorubhayabindusamarasībhūtasya mātuguhyacakra utpitsorālayavijñānasya yaikakṣaṇaṃ kevalasukhasaṃvṛttiḥ,
T17n958u_001:174: yadā tu garbhagatasyaiva rūpādivāsanātmakapañcajñānasaṃvittiḥ kūrmavadviniḥsṛtapañcasphoṭakākārastadā pañcākārābhisaṃbodhiḥ |
T17n958u_001:175: tataḥ pratisvaṃ pañcajñānānāṃ yadā pṛthivyādicaturdhātuvāsanābhedaḥ kāyo'pi viṃśatyaṅgulīparipūrṇastadā viṃśatyākārābhisaṃbodhiḥ |
T17n958u_001:177: etadvaidharmyeṇa śuddhajñānavijñānātmako'cyuto binduḥ svābhāvikakāyajñānavajrayogo vajrasattvaḥ sarvārthadarśī ekakṣaṇābhisaṃbuddhatvādekakṣaṇābhisaṃbodhiḥ,
T17n958u_001:179: ....sa eva dharmakāyaścittavajrayogo mahāsattvaḥ paramākṣarasukhaḥ pañcākārābhisaṃbuddhatvāt pañcākārabhisaṃbodhiḥ |
T17n958u_001:181: sa eva saṃbhogakāyavāgvajrayogo bodhisattvo dvādaśākārasatyārtho bodhisattvānugrāhakaḥ sarvasattvarutairdharmadeśako viṃśatyākārābhisaṃbuddhatvād
T17n958u_001:183: sa eva nirmāṇakāyaḥ kāyavajrayogaḥ samayasattvaḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavedanenādyanugrāhako'nantamāyājālaiḥ sphāritakāyo māyājālabhisaṃbuddhatvānmāyājalābhisaṃbodhiḥ
T17n958u_001:191: māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavidanantamāyājālaiḥ sphāritakāya iti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 44-45)
T17n958u_001:198: tatrocyate--“tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam“ ityatra bahulavacanāt “saptamyā aluk“ ityaluksamāse kṛte'manasikāraḥ,
T17n958u_001:204: 'asūryampaśyā rājadārā' ityatra hi na sūryābhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ,
T17n958u_001:205: kintu rājadārāṇāṃ yat sūryadarśanaṃ prasajyaṃ tanniṣiddham |
T17n958u_001:206: evamevāmanasikāre'pi naño manasikaraṇaṃ yad grāhyagrāhakādi prasaktaṃ tanniṣiddham, na manaḥ |
T17n958u_001:212: athavā akārapradhāno manasikāra ityatra śākapārthivādivanmadhyamapadalopī samāsaḥ |
T17n958u_001:214: akārasyānutpādakārakatvam “akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmādyanutpannatvāt“ ityādinā hevajre uktam |
T17n958u_001:219: tathā ca hevajre -- “ālerādi nerādi nairātmyā“ iti |
T17n958u_001:220: etena sarvamanasikāro'nātmako'svabhāva ityuktaṃ bhavati | yadi vā --
T17n958u_001:227: etena amanasikārapadena acintyaprabhāsvarasvādhiṣṭhānapadaṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnayuganaddhādvayavāhisaṃvedanamāpāditaṃ bhavatīti | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 60-62)
T17n958u_001:236: dharmāḥ padmalīnāsteṣāmagraḥ pratyavekṣaṇājñānātmako'mitābhaḥ | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 51)
T17n958u_001:238: bhrūmadhye sthitvā'parimitāsthimālāpravartakatvāt tanmayo'mitābhaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:239: jñānamayyo'parimitā bhāso yasya so'yamamitābhaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 85)
T17n958u_001:241: amṛtaṃ śuktramityuktaṃ tatprasūtaṃ jagattrayam | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 56)
T17n958u_001:243: vighnāntako'mṛtakuṇḍalīti tasya dṛṣṭiramṛtasthānagatā lalāṭagatā | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 36-37)
T17n958u_001:244: upasādhanakāle tu bimbaṃ cāmṛtakuṇḍalīm | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 39)
T17n958u_001:250: iha pañcaratnaśabdena rasanāpañcamaṇḍaladharmiṇaḥ pṛthyādipañcadhātavastanmayaṃ śvāsaṃ pañcaratnamayamiti savyanāsāpuṭe |
T17n958u_001:255: taṃ ca prāṇavāyuṃ niścārya piṇḍarūpeṇa nāsikāgre vibhāvayet....karṇikātaḥ karṇikāmadhye na savyāpasavyakamaladala iti |
T17n958u_001:266: amoghaḥ karma ityuktaṃ kulānyetāni saṃkṣipet | (sa. si. 2.8)
T17n958u_001:270: sattvārthakriyāyāṃ sakalā siddhiaryataḥ so'moghasiddhiḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 85)
T17n958u_001:273: yatra nāsti tamevāhurayācitavidhiṃ budhāḥ || (sā. mā., pṛ. 334)
T17n958u_001:280: ābhyāṃ svaravyañjanadūtībhyāṃ mudrātrayasamāpattyā karmamāruteśvaradaṇḍabhedādavikalpasukhānubhavo budhyata ityarbudhaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ śirasaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 31)
T17n958u_001:282: arbudhe tu mahānāsā ḍākinī piśitāśinī | (va. ti., pṛ. 42)
T17n958u_001:286: avadhūtīkṛto mūlanālaheturiti śabdākṣaram | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 150)
T17n958u_001:294: stambhabhūtā mahārājñī sā'vadhūtītā kīrtitā || (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 20)
T17n958u_001:295: evaṃ vajravārāhīsvabhāvayā madhyanāḍyā'vadhūtyā eva sarvo'yaṃ nāḍīsaṃcayaḥ prādurbhūya tatraiva samavaśaraṇaṃ gacchati | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 58)
T17n958u_001:298: hetvavasthā nāma bodhicittāt prabhṛti bodhimaṇḍanivedanaṃ yāvat |
T17n958u_001:300: sattvārthakriyāvasthā nāma prathamadharmacakrapravartanāt prabhṛti ā śāsanāntardhānaṃ yāvat |
T17n958u_001:310: bhūmiprāptasya catasṛbhiḥ sampadbhiḥ sampannaṃ cittamiti tadarthaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāya ityetaḥ sapta pāramitāḥ |
T17n958u_001:312: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā |
T17n958u_001:313: praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānaṃ matāḥ pāramitā daśa || iti |
T17n958u_001:316: phalāvasthā-sattvārthakriyāvasthāsthitatasya ca śākyamuneriva anābhogena ādikarma pravartata iti | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 11-12)
T17n958u_001:321: imaṃ carmapuṭaṃ tāvat svabuddhau ca pṛthak kuru |
T17n958u_001:337: yayā manoramataravapuṣo yakṣiṇīrbhuṅkte sā yakṣāṅganāsiddhiḥ pañcamī |
T17n958u_001:338: yayā mukhakṣiptayā sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇyaṭitvā buddhebhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sā guli(ṭi)
T17n958u_001:343: karoti sā sūtakasiddhiraṣṭamītyaṣṭau mahāsiddhayaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 74)
T17n958u_001:345: jaṅghābhyāṃ romakūpaśuṣiravyāpakasvedapravartakatvād ākāśagarbhaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 49)
T17n958u_001:352: asya prasādāt prāpyante siddhayo'nekadhā budhaiḥ || (gu. si. 9.11)
T17n958u_001:359: ārād dūraṃ pāpakebhyo dharmebhyaścaratītyācāryaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pṛ. 7a)
T17n958u_001:361: yo'yaṃ cittavajradharaḥ svasaṃvedyasvarūpatvena prāguktamaṇḍalānyabhedena budhyate sa evācāryaḥ |
T17n958u_001:376: tasyāṃ sadā yakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāraḥ |
T17n958u_001:380: tasyāṃ nivāsī āḍhakavatīnivāsī mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣānāṃ bādhako yakṣādhipatiḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 1)
T17n958u_001:385: saṃtrastān duḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā prayacchedātmavigraham | (sā. mā., p. 169)
T17n958u_001:387: puṣpaikaṃ gṛhītvā om maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare rakṣa rakṣa mā hu phaṭ svāhā iti svaśirodeśe puṣpaṃ kṣipannātmarakṣāṃ kuryāt |
T17n958u_001:388: punaḥ om āḥ hu ityātmarakṣādimantraḥ | (sā. mā., pṛ. 102)
T17n958u_001:394: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamāṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ ca sādaram |
T17n958u_001:395: satataṃ sevayan dhīmān sukhī svastho'pi jāyate ||
T17n958u_001:397: dhyānaprajñeti dharmasya vīryaṃ tūbhayaormatam || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 2)
T17n958u_001:405: anādinidhano buddha ādibuddho niranvaya iti | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 7)
T17n958u_001:407: pṛthvīgarbho hutāśo bhavati na dharaṇimārutī śūnyagarbho....
T17n958u_001:408: vāyoḥ śūnyaṃ narendra prabhavati hi tathādhāra-ādheyabhāvaḥ ||
T17n958u_001:409: skandhādhāro hi bhauto bhavati varatanau bhūtavṛndasya nāḍyo...
T17n958u_001:418: upānantaryānyetāni mahāpāpakṛtā iti || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 46-47)
T17n958u_001:424: guhye tu bahirullekhavimukhe sukhaṃ bhujyate mayetyulekhalakṣitaṃ sukhasaṃvedanamātram |
T17n958u_001:431: viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 68)
T17n958u_001:441: anyathā--“paramaviramayormadhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru“ iti yaduktam,
T17n958u_001:442: tatsamgataṃ na bhavati | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 32)
T17n958u_001:444: ūrdhvādho lalanādiṣaṇṇāḍīṣu vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa prāṇāpānavāyoḥ saṃkramaṇamāyāma iti,
T17n958u_001:446: āsamantād yamanamāyāmaḥ prāṇāpānavāyormadhyanāḍyāṃ praveśaḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 4)
T17n958u_001:454: atītādyarthānāṃ yathāvat prakāśanamāryapatham | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 171)
T17n958u_001:458: tatra bhāvanāmārge jñeyāvaraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvamiti yā dhīḥ sā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ,
T17n958u_001:468: samantapratibhāsāyā bhūmeryadantaraṃ prādurbhavati | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 56) āliḥ
T17n958u_001:478: te eva lalanārasane candrasūryau prajñopāyau | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 6a)
T17n958u_001:485: tatra kāyāveśe utkalikā romāñco bhavati prakampanaṃ gātrāṇāṃ syāt,
T17n958u_001:489: vāgāveśe'pūrvapravacanaṃ sārūpyaṃ sadṛśaṃ sarvajñajñānapratipādanam | (ta. saṃ. ṭī., pṛ. 24-25)
T17n958u_001:496: yasya yad duṣparityājyaṃ taduttamamiti smṛtam | (jñā. si. 17.15)
T17n958u_001:501: sā yasmin samādhāvasti sa utpattikramaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 23a)
T17n958u_001:506: utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāro mukhabhujavarṇasaṃsthānakalnapārahita iti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 20)
T17n958u_001:529: ṭākki hūṃ jaḥ iti mantra uddhārasaṃjñakaḥ |
T17n958u_001:531: svahā nāsti na coṅkāro yasya sa uddhāra ucyate | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 151)
T17n958u_001:552: upāyo mahākaruṇā sarvasattveṣātmasamatānubhavaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 37b)
T17n958u_001:562: kaṣṭenāpi na cāniṣṭaṃ karotyupakṛtiṃ parām || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 10)
T17n958u_001:565: pratibhānunayanibandhanamapahāya hitāhiteṣu sattveṣu paramahitācaraṇam | (sā. mā., p. 57)
T17n958u_001:568: kopekṣā? sarvatra pratighānunayaparahitadharmatāyāṃ svarasavāhinī pravṛttiḥ | (sā. mā., pṛ. 115)
T17n958u_001:569: bījākṣarameva mañjughoṣarūpeṇātmānaṃ niṣpādayitumavadhāya aṣṭalokadharmeṣu upekṣaṇamupekṣā | (sā. mā., pṛ. 138)
T17n958u_001:581: tatra sarvaśūnyālayo ḍākinījālātmakajālandharābhidhānaṃ merugiriśikharamityarthaḥ | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 151) ūṣmā
T17n958u_001:583: udare jaṭharāgnestadvāhitvādūṣmā kaṇṭhe | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 45)
T17n958u_001:594: cittasamādhiprahāṇeyaḥ saṃskārasamanvita ṛddhipādaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 53)
T17n958u_001:595: vivekaniśrito virāganiśrito nirodhaniśrito vyavasargapariṇataśca saṃskṛtavastuvisaṃyogād dravyasargatatprahāṇe samanvāgata ṛddhipāda iti pañcāṅgaḥ
T17n958u_001:596: saṃpiṇḍya viṃśatiprakārāścatvāra ṛddhipādāḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 54)
T17n958u_001:599: tataśca sarva eva daśabalavaiśāradyādayo buddhaguṇā yasyāṃ vṛddhimupayānti sarddhiḥ samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
T17n958u_001:600: tasyāḥ pādā iva pādāḥ prāptihetava iti ṛddhipādāḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 54)
T17n958u_001:611: e rahasye khadhātau vā bhage dharmodaye'mbuje |
T17n958u_001:612: siṃhāsane sthito vajrī uktastantrāntare mayā || (vi. pra., pṛ. 39) evam
T17n958u_001:617: atasteṣāṃ karaṇḍakaṇṭhānāṃ saiva rasaṃ bodhanaṃ nijaprabhorvajradharasya veśa ābharaṇamalaṅkaraḥ,
T17n958u_001:624: bindu cānāhataṃ jñānaṃ tajjātānyakṣarāṇi ca || (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 68)
T17n958u_001:626: sarvāsrayaṃ pitā mātā dvyakṣaraṃ kathitaṃ tathā ||
T17n958u_001:628: bindustatra bhaved yogaḥ sa yogaḥ paramādbhutaḥ ||
T17n958u_001:632: binduścānāhataṃ tattvaṃ tajjātānyakṣarāṇi ca || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 13)
T17n958u_001:634: evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako'dvayo'nādinirdhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako'dvayo yogo niranvayo yoginā'vagantavya iti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 34)
T17n958u_001:639: ekāreṇa locanā devī vaṃkāreṇa māmakī smṛtā |
T17n958u_001:640: makāreṇa pāṇḍarā ca yākāreṇa tāraṇī smṛtā || (he. ta. 1.1.22)
T17n958u_001:642: mayeti calanaṃ proktaṃ vajradharasya lakṣanam | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 2a)
T17n958u_001:643: ekāraḥ pṛthivī jñeyā karmamudrā tu locanā |
T17n958u_001:645: vaṃkārastu jalaṃ jñeyam dharmamudrā tu māmakī |
T17n958u_001:650: sthitā mahāsukhacakre dvātriṃśaddalapaṅkaje || (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 2b)
T17n958u_001:652: airāvatī airāvata iva vegavāhinī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:655: oḍiyānastathā caiṣa dakṣiṇakarṇa ucyate | (va. ti., pṛ. 31)
T17n958u_001:656: savyakarṇamārgeṇa caṇḍālyā oḍyākhye khecaravṛttyā yānaṃ bahirnirgamanam,
T17n958u_001:657: tatra uḍḍiyanaṃ ca dakṣiṇakarṇaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 31)
T17n958u_001:662: oḍyordhvagamanena rāti svīkaroti caṇḍālīti oḍraṃ stanadvayam | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 33)
T17n958u_001:663: oḍre pittavahā nāḍī mahābhairavikā smṛtā | (va. ti., pṛ. 44)
T17n958u_001:668: muṃmuṇi nābhau aṃkāraḥ kakkolaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 54b)
T17n958u_001:669: karṇamūlaṃ prāpya tvaṅmalaṃ prerayatīti kaṅkālaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:671: kaṅkāladaṇḍarūpo he sumerurgirirāṭ tathā | (va. ti., pṛ. 62)
T17n958u_001:674: kaṃ mukhaṃ pālayatīti kapālaṃ kamalam | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 62a)
T17n958u_001:676: svāhāsti nāsti praṇavaḥ kabandha iti saṃvṛtibodhicittam,
T17n958u_001:682: kā karuṇā? yā triduḥkhaduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃsārasāgarāduddharaṇakāmanā | (sā. mā., pṛ. 115 )
T17n958u_001:683: tatra duḥkhād duḥkhahetoḥ samuddharaṇalakṣaṇā karuṇā | (sā. mā., pṛ. 138)
T17n958u_001:684: karuṇāṃ duḥkhād duḥkhahetoḥ samuddharaṇakāmanām | (sā. mā., pṛ. 172)
T17n958u_001:688: athavā triduḥkhaduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃsārāmbudheḥ samuddharaṇecchā | (sā. mā., pṛ. 203)
T17n958u_001:691: karuṇā nāma sarvasattvān asminneva jñānarāje pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi,
T17n958u_001:696: ālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānando lokasaṃvṛtyeti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 215)
T17n958u_001:702: tasya saukhyaṃ mahāmudrā saṃsthitā nābhimaṇḍale || (he. ta. 2.4.40)
T17n958u_001:705: īryā ca kāyikaṃ karma vācikaṃ dharmadeśanā |
T17n958u_001:706: samādānaṃ manaḥkarma nirvikalpasya dhīmataḥ || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 54)
T17n958u_001:720: mudaṃ sukhaviśeṣaṃ ratiṃ dadātīti mudrā | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 56)
T17n958u_001:730: tat svacchamāsthānaṃ bolakakkolarasasaṃyogena avadhūtyā saṃvṛtibodhicittamaṇyantargataṃ yadā bhavet,
T17n958u_001:734: haṭhayoge ca karmamudrāyā nispandaphalamuktam | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 32-33)
T17n958u_001:748: atra ca avidyāmalakṣālanāyākṣobhyarūpeṇa vajrācāryeṇa vairocanarūpāvalambini śiṣye salilābhiṣeko deyaḥ |
T17n958u_001:751: evaṃ vajraghaṇṭā'pi pūrvābhisandhānena dvādaśāṅgulaparimāṇā'dhomukhāmbhojavajrasamāpattiniḥsvabhāvatvena sarvadharmasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayitumabhedyajñānanigadatāṃ dharmodayasya bodhayituṃ mūrdhādhobhāge ca vajrāvalīyugalamālinī |
T17n958u_001:753: anuttarāśeṣadharmabodhād vikārakamiha prādhānyakhyāpanāya hetukatāpratipādanāya ca kāraṇabhūtamapi vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekamullaṅghya prathamaṃ vajrābhiṣekadānam
T17n958u_001:754: sarvadharmā nāmata iti pratipādanārthaṃ bhaviṣyanmunīndrapadocitanāmanidānāvadānārthaṃ ca pūrvanāmavyapanayena svadevatākulagotrānusāreṇa nāmābhiṣekaḥ
T17n958u_001:760: śyāmādevī kaliṅge tu pārśvatastu samāśritā | (va. ti., pṛ. 45)
T17n958u_001:769: atra ko'liḥ -- k kh g gh ṅ c ch j jh ñ ṭ ṭh ḍ ḍh ṇ h b bh m t th d dh n ś ṣ s ka iti ko'lirvyañjanapaṅktiḥ |

T17n958u_001:771: a ā e ai ar ār o au al āl aṃ aḥ;
T17n958u_001:772: ha hā ya yā ra rā va vā la lā ha haḥ iti asamayaḥ svaramelāpakaḥ |
T17n958u_001:773: asminnasamaye kaliṃ yunaktīti kaliyugasamayaḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:792: hayakarṇā tu kāñcīsthā viṣṭhāṃ vahati sarvadā | (va. ti., pṛ. 45)
T17n958u_001:794: siṅghāṇakasyātyayanādyāvat kātyāyanī jānudvaye | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:796: kaṃ sukhaṃ pālituṃ samartha iti kāpālikaḥ | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 36)
T17n958u_001:797: kaṃ saṃvṛtibodhicittaṃ pālayatīti kāpālikaḥ | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 63)
T17n958u_001:802: tāsu viśvaramaṇeśvaro bhavati | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 59)
T17n958u_001:805: te te kāmaratāḥ sattvāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ syuragrasādhane || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:808: kāmaṃ rūpamabhilaṣaṇīyaṃ darśanaṃ yasya sa kāmarūpaḥ kakṣadvayam | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 33)
T17n958u_001:812: rūpādīni kāmayanti prārthayantīti kāmāścāturmahārājakāyikādayo devāḥ | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 86)
T17n958u_001:817: saṃskāro vedanā saṃjñā rūpaṃ vijñānameva ca |
T17n958u_001:820: kāyacakre tu ḍākinyo bāhyāḥ pātālavāsikāḥ | (va. ti., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:825: evaṃ sati svapnāvasthākṣayātmakaḥ prāṇasya layo vāgbindunirodhāt kaṇṭhe saṃbhogakāyaḥ |
T17n958u_001:826: jāgratsvapnāvasthāyāṃ śabdādiviṣayān viracaccalaṃ cyutidharmakaṃ tamo'bhibhūtaṃ cittamaṣṭādaśadhātuvikārāpannam,
T17n958u_001:828: ..... kāyādibindūnāṃ cyavanaṃ tasya bandhaḥ sahajasukhena turyāvasthākṣayaḥ |
T17n958u_001:835: tadeva nirmitaṃ citraṃ bījaḥ sarvasvabhāvataḥ || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 40)
T17n958u_001:836: ata eva dharmāṇāmāśrayaḥ kāyo dharmakāya ityācakṣate |
T17n958u_001:837: ....tasmād yuganaddhakāya eva dharmakāyaḥ sāmbhogikasvābhāvikābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūto yogipratyātmavedyaḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 57)
T17n958u_001:838: garbhe saṃśuddhakāyaḥ prasavanasamayād dantabhāve ca dharmaḥ | ......
T17n958u_001:841: rūpādayaḥ pañca skandhā ṣaḍ indriyāṇi dhātavo viṣayāśca grāhyagrāhakagrahaṇopalakṣitapallavatvāt kāyastaruvaratvena gṛhītaḥ | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 2)
T17n958u_001:845: adhamaṃ kāyikaṃ dvāraṃ sthūlaṃ daivatanirmitam | (va. ti., pṛ. 19-20)
T17n958u_001:848: vaktragudayośca tannāmnā prasiddhā eva samayacakrasthā jñātavyāḥ,
T17n958u_001:851: .......ubhayadharmarahitatvācchūnyo'yaṃ kāya iti yā'nusmṛtistasyā upa samīpe cittasya sthānaṃ kāyānusmṛtyupasthānam | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 52)
T17n958u_001:855: tasya kālasya nirāvaraṇaskandhadhātvāyatanaṃ cakraṃ tribhavasyaikatvaṃ nirāvaraṇajñeyam |
T17n958u_001:857: sarvākāraṃ sarvendriyaṃ bindurūpaṃ viśvamāyādharaṃ bhagavataḥ śarīraṃ prajñopāyātmakam | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 3)
T17n958u_001:866: catuḥkāyātmakaḥ sa eva kālacakro bhagavān prajñopāyātmako jñānajñeyasambandhenoktaḥ |
T17n958u_001:873: śūnyatā cakramutyuktaṃ kālacakro'dvayo mataḥ || (vi. pra., pṛ. 8)
T17n958u_001:875: tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikaṃ cakraṃ yasya śarīram,
T17n958u_001:878: kākārāt kāraṇe śānte lakārācca layo'tra vai |
T17n958u_001:881: tasya bandhaḥ sahajasukheneti kālacakraḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 17)
T17n958u_001:882: evaṃ karmāstivādī bhavati sa bhagavānekaśāstā na kartā
T17n958u_001:884: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraḥ śaraṇamadhigato yasya pādābjamūle
T17n958u_001:885: taṃ vande kālacakraṃ jinavarajananaṃ nirguṇaṃ nirvikalpam || (kā. ta. 2.92)
T17n958u_001:886: jñānakāyo bhagavān samyaksambuddho devāsuranāgādibhirnamaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ kālacakra iti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 225)
T17n958u_001:903: śāntike vartulaṃ kuṇḍaṃ caturasra tu pauṣṭike |
T17n958u_001:908: śuklavarṇaṃ bhavecchāntau pītaṃ tu pauṣṭike tathā |
T17n958u_001:909: māraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca vaśye raktaṃ prakīrtitam |
T17n958u_001:910: yathā vaśye tathākṛṣṭau dveṣādau yathā māraṇe ||
T17n958u_001:911: tilaṃ śāntau dadhi puṣṭau māraṇe kaṇṭakaṃ tathā |
T17n958u_001:912: dveṣādau kaṇṭakaṃ proktaṃ vaśya ākṛṣṭau cotpalam || (he. ta. 2.1.6-10)
T17n958u_001:915: tatra haviṣaḥ pātāt | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 67)
T17n958u_001:920: sā prakṛtipariśuddhā'vadhūtikā kulaśabdena boddhavyā | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 126)
T17n958u_001:921: vajra padma tathā karma tathāgata ratnaiva ca |
T17n958u_001:929: ḍombī vajrakulī khyātā naṭī padmakulī tathā |
T17n958u_001:930: caṇḍālī ratnakulī caiva dvijā tāthāgatī matā ||
T17n958u_001:931: rajakī karmakulī caiva etā mudrā susiddhidāḥ |
T17n958u_001:932: āsāṃ śukraṃ bhaved vajraṃ pūjayitvā pibed vratī || (he. ta. 2.3.61-63)
T17n958u_001:934: tān tadvyavasthitān sattvān ratnadānena lāti svīkarotīti kulo ratnaketuḥ | (ku. sa. pra., pṛ. 68)
T17n958u_001:937: kuvikalpānāṃ lavanāt kulatā jānunī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 35)
T17n958u_001:942: binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣara ekāro dharmodayaḥ sarvākāraśūnyatārūpa iti |
T17n958u_001:943: .... evaṃ binduśūnyaṣaḍakṣaro dharmodayaḥ kuliśadhara ekāra iti śūnyatā sālambā pratisenāsvarūpiṇīti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 49)
T17n958u_001:945: kūrmapṛṣṭhamivābhedyamityasthimālāvanāt kūrmajā bhrūmadhye | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 44) kṛpā
T17n958u_001:952: kośalaṃ siṅghānaṃ śalati vahati yasmāt tatkośalaṃ nāsikāgram | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 33)
T17n958u_001:953: antramālākulā divyā surābhakṣī tu kośale | (va. ti., pṛ. 44)
T17n958u_001:960: satyadvayaṃ samāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā || (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 2b)
T17n958u_001:962: kramadvayamupādāya deśanā vajradhāriṇām || (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 2b)
T17n958u_001:967: vicitraṃ ca vipākaṃ ca vimardaṃ ca vilakṣaṇam |
T17n958u_001:971: vimardamārocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
T17n958u_001:972: vilakṣaṇaṃ tribhyo'nyad rāgāragavivarjitam || (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 68)
T17n958u_001:977: sekahaṭhayoge cedaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 32)
T17n958u_001:987: khaṇḍaṃ śiraḥsthaṃ bodhicittaṃ nakhadaśanarūpeṇa kalayati prerayatīti khaṇḍakapālī |(va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:990: tadviśuddhyā tatraiva rohatīti khaṇḍarohā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 41)
T17n958u_001:992: ādau tathāgatalocanādīn khaṇḍayati punarohayati janayatīti khaṇḍarohā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:998: kharā cāsau tricakradāhād varā cāsau punastadāpyāyanāditi kharvarī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:1001: pullīrādārabhya mālavāntaṃ yā nāḍyastāḥ khecaryaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 27)
T17n958u_001:1011: icchāprakāmatā iti guṇāṣṭakam | (ta. saṃ. ṭī., pṛ. 27)
T17n958u_001:1013: paryupāsyo jagannātho guruḥ sarvārthasiddhidaḥ | (pra. vi. si. 2.26)
T17n958u_001:1014: gururbuddho bhaved dharmaḥ saṃghascāpi sa eva hi |
T17n958u_001:1030: tathāgatadeśitadharmasiṃhanādena sarvasattvānāṃ pratyakarutairdharmapravartako guhyādhipatiḥ śrīvajrapāṇiḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 1-2)
T17n958u_001:1033: prajñopāyaguhyābhyāṃ dīpayata iti vyutpattiḥ | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 38)
T17n958u_001:1034: guhyasthitamaṇinā yad gurūpadeśataḥ kṣaṇacatuṣṭyātmakānandacatuṣṭayasya vedanaṃ tad guhyābhiṣeka ityucyate,
T17n958u_001:1036: atrābhiṣeke madhyendriyāṇāṃ samayamudrābhāvanopadeśaḥ kathyate | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 7b)
T17n958u_001:1044: gṛhasya śarīrasya devatā vairocano gṛhadevatā viḍdhātuḥ,
T17n958u_001:1045: tadādhāratvād gṛhadevatā gudadvāram |(va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 34)
T17n958u_001:1047: khaṇḍaroheti vikhyātā ḍākinī parameśvarī || (va. ti., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:1049: godāvarī tathā jñeyā vāmakarṇasvarūpikā | (va. ti., pṛ. 32)
T17n958u_001:1050: gāṃ bhuvaṃ bhūsvabhāvaṃ nirmāṇacakraṃ varata iti godā'vadhūtī,
T17n958u_001:1051: tayā vriyate cchādyata iti godāvarī vāmakarṇaḥ | (va. ti. tī., pṛ. 32)
T17n958u_001:1052: mahorusthā tu yā nāḍī godāvaryāṃ vyavasthitā |
T17n958u_001:1053: vīramatīti vikhyātā sthitā sā dṛḍharūpataḥ || (va. ti., pṛ. 42)
T17n958u_001:1055: śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti śabdaṃ khalu jinajanako dharmadhātuṃ ca vāyu-
T17n958u_001:1056: rgandhaṃ vanhiśca rūpaṃ rasamapi salilaṃ sparśameva dharitrī | (kā.ta. 2.20)
T17n958u_001:1063: va bhakṣaṇāt sa eva ghuṇaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 83)
T17n958u_001:1087: saṃbhogaṃ bhuñjanaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ vai rasarūpiṇām |
T17n958u_001:1088: kaṇṭhe saṃbhogacakraṃ ca mahāsukhaṃ śirasi sthitam ||...
T17n958u_001:1089: sthāvarī nirmāṇacakre tu nirmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ yataḥ |
T17n958u_001:1091: saṃvidī saṃbhogacakre ca kaṇṭhe saṃvedanaṃ yataḥ |
T17n958u_001:1092: mahāsaṃghī mahāsukhacakre ca mahāsukhaṃ ke sthitaṃ yataḥ || (he. ta. 2.4. 52-55, 59-60)
T17n958u_001:1094: cakreṣu vartituṃ śīlaṃ yasyāḥ sā cakravartinī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:1097: cakrāṇyeva varma sannāho'syāḥ sā cakravarmiṇī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:1100: cakravaccakreṣu vego'syā gamanāgamana iti cakravegā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:1103: jñānakramād māṃsacakṣurdivyacakṣurbuddhacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣurjñānacakṣurbhāvanābalena bhaviṣyati | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 38)
T17n958u_001:1104: atra prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣā''dikarmiko yogī viśvabimbamabhijñāmantareṇa paśyati |
T17n958u_001:1110: evaṃ tathāgatasya pañca cakṣūṃṣi māṃsādīnyuktāni śūnyatādarśanaṃ prati |
T17n958u_001:1120: caṇḍe tīkṣṇe dāhake vāmetare nāḍyāvasyā iti caṇḍākṣī,
T17n958u_001:1121: madhyamayā dvayoḥ prakāśanāt | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 53)
T17n958u_001:1124: dahati ca locanādirdaghe'haṃ sravate śaśī || (he. ta. 1.1.31)
T17n958u_001:1129: caṇḍā dharmodayā raktā āliścādyakṣaraḥ smṛtaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 10a)
T17n958u_001:1132: ataḥ śūnyatākaruṇe caṇḍālīśabdenocyate | (he. ta. ṭī., pṛ. 10b)
T17n958u_001:1137: prajñājñānameva prakṛtirūpaṃ vikārarūpaṃ prakṛtisamutpādātmakaṃ yuganaddhādvayavāhisuviśuddhasvabhāvaṃ caturthārthamityapare |
T17n958u_001:1138: pakṣāntarāṇi ca vistarabhayānnocyante | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 39)
T17n958u_001:1153: adhyāsaṅgaparilakṣaṇamupekṣāṃ ca vibhāvya.... |(a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 4-5)
T17n958u_001:1158: tato nirmalībhūtacittasantāne karuṇāmaitrīmuditāpekṣā bhāvayet | (sa. mā., pṛ. 138)
T17n958u_001:1159: tadanantaraṃ caturbrahmavihāraṃ maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsaṃjñakaṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa bhāvayet | (sā. mā., pṛ. 202)

T17n958u_001:3707: dvādaśa cakrāṇi vakṣyamāṇe vaktavyānītyaṣṭādaśacakraniyamaḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 169)
T17n958u_001:3709: hṛccakre dharmakāyo bhavati hi nṛpa sambhogacakre jinasya |
T17n958u_001:3711: hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakraṃ śirasi ca kamalaṃ dharmasambhogaśuddham ||
T17n958u_001:3712: nābhau kaṇṭhe ca guhye śirasi ca hṛdaye tadvaduṣṇīṣamadhye
T17n958u_001:3714: cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajamasivaraṃ ṣaṭkulaṃ vajrayuktaṃ
T17n958u_001:3717: mātsaryaṃ jñānadhātau bhavati varatanau cāmbare dveṣacittam
T17n958u_001:3718: īrṣyācittaṃ hi vāyau prakaṭitamanale rāgacittaṃ tathaiva |
T17n958u_001:3736: ṣaḍ jñānaskandhā iti skandhavikārāḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 49)
T17n958u_001:3737: dānaṃ gomayamanbunā ca sahitaṃ śīlaṃ ca samārjanaṃ
T17n958u_001:3740: etāḥ pāramitāḥ ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam ||
T17n958u_001:3744: sugatavaragṛhe'smin kāyakarmāṇi kṛtvā || (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 6)
T17n958u_001:3746: asāvevādvayo'kṣara ūrdhvaretā guhyanābhihṛṭkaṇṭhagamanena yathākramaṃ vajrasattvādināmacatuṣṭayaṃ labhate |
T17n958u_001:3748: uṣṇīṣagaḥ kālacakra iti nāmeti ṣaṭsattvāḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 29)
T17n958u_001:3752: hamoddeśaḥ--yaḥ sattvaḥ kāmadhātvādirūpakāyavākcittaikatvākhyaḥ sa paramākṣaramuddiśyata iti vajrasattvaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3753: yadvā vajramabhedyaṃ kāyavākacittaikarasaṃ mahāsukhajñānaṃ sattvaṃ traibhavasyaikatā jñeyamābhyāmaikyaṃ paramākṣaraṃ sa mahān mahāsukhapūrṇatvānmahārāga uddiṣṭaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3754: sa ca sattvo bhūmibhiḥ pūrṇatvāt sarvasattvaratiṅkara uddiṣṭa iti mahāsattvaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3756: tena pūrṇo yaḥ sattvo bhūmiśca sa mahāsattvaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3757: yato'sau bodhau śūnyatākaruṇātmikāyāṃ dharmacakre sthito'calasthitaḥ kleśādirūpedveṣasaṃghānāṃ vijayitvānmahādveṣo mahāripuścoddiṣṭaḥ,
T17n958u_001:3759: sa yataḥ samayasya candrāmṛtākhyaśukrasya sukhe'cyutirūpaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ mohavijayitvānmahāmoho mūḍhadhiyāṃ mohaghātakaścoddiṣṭastataḥ samasattvaḥ
T17n958u_001:3760: sa eva yataḥ kāyādivajrāṇāṃ prajñayā bimbenākṣarabindubhiśca saha yoga ekatvam,
T17n958u_001:3764: ata eva sattvān mocayitvā mahālobhaḥ kṣaralobhaghātakaścopadiṣṭa iti kālacakraḥ |
T17n958u_001:3773: ṣaḍāyatanāni ṣaṭcakravartinaḥ khaṇḍakapālādyāḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 67)
T17n958u_001:3779: cakrī kuṇḍalaṃ kaṇṭhikā rucakaṃ mekhalā bhasma yajñopavītamiti (ṣaṇmudrāḥ) | (vi. pra., pṛ. 186)
T17n958u_001:3792: mūrcchite skandhavijñāne kutaḥ siddhiraninditā || (ta. saṃ. ṭī., pṛ. 6)
T17n958u_001:3797: tatra sattvāvalambinī ekādaśyādyāḥ pañca tithayaḥ pūrṇimāparyantam |
T17n958u_001:3838: tatra śūnyatā pañcaskandhaśūnyatā kṛṣṇapratipadādyāḥ pañca tithayaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3842: amāntaśuklapratipatpraveśayormadhye ṣoḍaśī śūnyatā sarvākārā | (vi. pra., pṛ. 21)
T17n958u_001:3860: iti tṛtīyo yogaḥ tathā omṇṭrā iti kāyasahajānandaḥ |
T17n958u_001:3869: evaṃ ṣoḍaśānandabhedāḥ śrītantre vistareṇa draṣṭavyāḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 27)
T17n958u_001:3883: saptamo dviprabhedaḥ syādalaṅkāraḥ samāsataḥ || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 2)
T17n958u_001:3885: kā saṃjñā asya tantrasya kiṃnimittamidaṃ kṛtam |
T17n958u_001:3886: ko vā kartā pramā kāsya kiṃ vā cāsya prayojanam ||
T17n958u_001:3887: tantrasya nāma saṃjñā syānnimittaṃ rāgiṇo janāḥ |
T17n958u_001:3888: kartā tu vajrasattvo'sya parimāṇaṃ tu kīrtyate ||
T17n958u_001:3889: paricchedo'tha kalpaśca khaṇḍaḥ paṭala eva ca |
T17n958u_001:3892: aṣṭau ca siddhayaścaiva buddhatvamapi cottamam || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 2)
T17n958u_001:3898: phalākāṅkṣī cared dharmaṃ sa heturiti kathyate ||
T17n958u_001:3908: kramaśaḥ pañcapiṇḍārthān jñātvā ṣaṭkoṭimāviśet || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 1)
T17n958u_001:3909: ṣaṭkoṭikaṃ ca vyākhyānam | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 2)
T17n958u_001:3923: tattvasya kathanaṃ vyakta nosandhyā samudāhṛtam || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 3)
T17n958u_001:3924: sandhyābhāṣā na ca sandhyābhāṣaṃ neyārthamarthaṃ na ca neyamartham |
T17n958u_001:3925: yathārutaṃ naiva yathārutaṃ ca ṣaṭkoṭikāyaṃ khalu yogatantre || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 10)
T17n958u_001:3929: garbhī ca trividhaḥ khyāto dvividhaḥ koliko mataḥ |
T17n958u_001:3937: dvividhaḥ kolikaḥ proktaḥ kolaḥ paryantavācakaḥ || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 3)
T17n958u_001:3941: yathārutaṃ nasandhyā ca neyārthaṃ vāpi yojayet |
T17n958u_001:3946: vyākhyātantrānusāreṇa vineyeṣu tathāgataiḥ || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 4)
T17n958u_001:3954: grāhyaṃ śrutvādhikaṃ bhūri na śaknoti prakāśitum |
T17n958u_001:3962: puṇḍarīkotpalau caiva padma candana eva ca |
T17n958u_001:3967: vyākhyānaṃ dvividhaṃ kuryād vajrācāryo vicakṣaṇaḥ || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 4)
T17n958u_001:3970: sa saptamo hyalaṅkāro niṣpannakramasādhanaḥ ||(gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 5)
T17n958u_001:3972: ekasvabhāvastu mahāsukhabhāva eva yogīśvarasya samatāyogaḥ | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 158)
T17n958u_001:3988: taṃ lāti gṛhṇātīti samayamaṇḍalam | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 94)
T17n958u_001:3990: sambhoganirmāṇakāyākārasvabhāvena svacchākāreṇa ca sattvārthāya vajradharasya herukākāreṇa visphuraṇaṃ yat sā samayamudretyabhidhīyate |
T17n958u_001:3991: tāṃ ca samayamudrāṃ gṛhītvā cakrākārena pañcavidhaṃ jñānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ parikalpya ādarśa-samatā-pratyavekṣaṇā-kṛtyānuṣṭhāna-suviśuddhadharmadhātubhiḥ,
T17n958u_001:3995: atra punastattvalīnaḥ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī samayavajraśabdena vivakṣitaḥ | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 17)
T17n958u_001:4000: nādiṃ gādiṃ tathā hādimantaśvamādiśvaṃ ca vā || (he. ta. 1.11.8)
T17n958u_001:4002: yadeva na karoti sa evāsya saṃvaraḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 23a)
T17n958u_001:4005: samaṃ tulyamiti proktaṃ tasya cakro rasaḥ smṛtaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4006: samarasaṃ tvekabhāvamatenārthena bhaṇyate || (he. ta. 1.8.40; sa. si. 2.4)
T17n958u_001:4017: samāsataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmekākārarūpato yaduta mahāsukhākārataścittamiti bodhicittaṃ samājarūpīti |
T17n958u_001:4018: dharmamudrāmahāmudrābihiṣekarūpaṃ vā jñānaṃ sat samāja ityabhidhīyate (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 35)
T17n958u_001:4022: jhaṭiti jñānaniṣpattiḥ samādhiriti saṅgitam | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 31)
T17n958u_001:4024: prajñopāyasamāpattyā niṣpāandādikrameṇa vyamakamalodgame'kṣarasukhavaśājjñeyajñānaikalolībhūtatvena vaimalyāvasthāyāṃ sarvabhāvān pratibhāsarūpān sthāvarajaṅgamān samāsataḥ saṃkṣepāt saṃhṛtya upasaṃhṛtya piṇḍayogena paramānāśravamahāsukhātmakaprabhāsvaraikarūpeṇa bhakṣitasarvalohādidhāturasaikarūpasiddhirasarūpeṇeva tasya paramānāśravamahāsukhaikarasaprabhāsvarasaya madhye bimbaṃ saṃvṛtisatyātmakaṃ bhāvayet paśyet |
T17n958u_001:4025: ...jñānasya satyadvayādvaidhībhāvasya jhaṭiti niṣpattiradhigamaḥ samādhiriti | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 33-34)
T17n958u_001:4028: tasya vaśitāmātraṃ tasmādacalanaṃ tato nirāvaraṇatvaṃ bhavet |
T17n958u_001:4031: samādhīyate cetasi sthāpyata iti samādhiḥ | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 115)
T17n958u_001:4045: kaṇṭhamadhye gataṃ cāpi padmaṃ tu ṣoḍaśacchadam | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 78)
T17n958u_001:4050: catasṛbhiḥ kalābhistu samantāt parivāritaḥ || (va. ti., pṛ. 79)
T17n958u_001:4052: saṃbhogastu tadākhyāto buddhānāṃ kāya uttamaḥ || (va. ti., pṛ. 81-82)
T17n958u_001:4054: catu pramāṇabhāvanānantaraṃ sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhatāṃ cintayet -- sarva evāmī dharmāḥ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇa pariśuddhāḥ,
T17n958u_001:4056: imāmeva sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhatāṃ om svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddho'hamityanena dṛḍhī kuryāt | (sā. mā., pṛ. 57-58)
T17n958u_001:4058: sarva eva dharmāḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena pariśuddhāḥ,
T17n958u_001:4060: imāṃ ca sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhatāmanena mantreṇādhitiṣṭhet--om svabhāvaśudhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddho'hamiti | (sā. mā. pṛ. 203)
T17n958u_001:4063: tatreyaṃ śūnyatā-- manomātramevedaṃ tena tenākāreṇa prakāśātmakaṃ pratibhāsate |
T17n958u_001:4064: yathā svapne nāsti manaso bāhyaṃ manogrāhyam |
T17n958u_001:4070: imāmeva śūnyatā om śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako'hamityumunā mantreṇādhiṣṭhet | (sā. mā., pṛ. 58)
T17n958u_001:4073: imāmeva śūnyatāmanenāpi mantreṇādhitiṣṭhet --om śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvāko'hamiti | (sā. mā., pṛ. 204)
T17n958u_001:4076: yathā svapne nāsti cittād bāhyacittaṃ grāhyagrāhakābhāvād cittamapi grāhakaṃ bhavati tasmāccitaśarīrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
T17n958u_001:4077: teṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakaśūnyatā paramārtha ityevamekāntena niścitya bhrāntisamāropitaṃ bhrānticihnaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmākāramapahāya teṣāṃ prakṛtimeva kevalāmadvayavijñaptilakṣaṇāṃ śuddhaspaṭikasaṃkāśāṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganopamāmanantāṃ paśyet |
T17n958u_001:4080: saiva bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā saiva paramā rakṣā | (sā. mā., pṛ. 225-226)
T17n958u_001:4090: .... ācāryāḥ kuśalatayā prajñājñānamāsādya sahajamanubhūtamiti kṛtvā santoṣamutpādayanti,
T17n958u_001:4091: santuṣṭāśca santo dharmamudrāyā vārtāmapi na jānanti |
T17n958u_001:4092: dharmamudrāmajānānā kevalayā karmamudrayā kṛtrimayā kathamakṛtrimabhūtaṃ sahajākhyaṃ jñānamutpadyate |
T17n958u_001:4099: tat svacchamāsthānaṃ bolakakkolarasasaṃyogena avadhūtyā saṃvṛtibodhicittamaṇyantargataṃ yadā bhavet,
T17n958u_001:4100: tadā kṣaṇikanāmāparaṃ sahajākhyaṃ jñānamutpadyate | (a. va. saṃ. pṛ. 32-33)
T17n958u_001:4101: kakkole bolakaṃ kṣiptvā kunduru kurute vratī |
T17n958u_001:4102: tasmin yogasamudbhūtaṃ karpuraṃ sahajaṃ smṛtam || (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 69)
T17n958u_001:4103: caṇḍālīyogabhāvanayā mahāsukhacakre cittasthirīkaraṇaṃ hi sahajasphuṭīkaraṇakāraṇamiti | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 71)
T17n958u_001:4105: ...anyaiḥ sarvairmokṣasamūhaṃ yat parikalpitaṃ pṛthak pṛthak tatsarvaṃ sahajameveti nānyat |
T17n958u_001:4112: pustake dṛśyamāne ca sattvārthāya na saṃvidām |
T17n958u_001:4114: tattadvastu na dṛśyeta abhrāntaṃ guruparvayā | iti |
T17n958u_001:4116: tat sarvaṃ sahajasyaiva nānyasya | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 86-87)
T17n958u_001:4117: sahajamekaṃ paraṃ tattvamasti | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 155)
T17n958u_001:4118: dvaividhyaṃ sahajaṃ tataḥ | (he. ta. 1.8.27; sa. si. 1.5)
T17n958u_001:4119: sahajaṃ caturvidhaṃ yasmādutpannakramapakṣataḥ | (he. ta. 1.8.30; sa. si. 1.8)
T17n958u_001:4121: nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminnapi labhyate |
T17n958u_001:4122: ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā || (he. ta. 1.8.36; sa. si. 1.15)
T17n958u_001:4124: sahaja iti sahajānandaḥ sambodhiḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 39a)
T17n958u_001:4125: ādhyātmikaprajñopāyābhyāṃ sahajābhyāṃ yadutpannamanāsravalakṣaṇaṃ tatsahajaṃ paramārthaśabdenocyate | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 41a)
T17n958u_001:4128: tābhyāmabhinnaṃ prabhāsvaralakṣaṇaṃ pāramārthkasambodhicittaśabdena kathitam | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 41b)
T17n958u_001:4129: dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ sahaja iti paryāyaḥ | (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 47b)
T17n958u_001:4130: na rāgo na virāgaśca madhyamaṃ nopalabhyate |
T17n958u_001:4136: tasmāt sahajaṃ jagatsarvaṃ sahajaṃ svarūpamucyate | (he. ta. 2.2.44)
T17n958u_001:4138: sa eva bhagavān mantranaye phalalakṣaṇe sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ityukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnāṃ saṃvaraśca | (vi. pra., pṛ. 43)
T17n958u_001:4140: ādhyātmikā vidyā prajñāpāramitā prakṛtiprabhāsvarā mahāmudrā sahajānandarūpiṇī dharmadhātuniṣpandapūrṇāvasthā sahajatanurityucyate | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 69)
T17n958u_001:4142: sa ca binduracyutaḥ san paramākṣara ucyate |
T17n958u_001:4144: akārasaṃbhavaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako vajrasattvo napuṃsakapadaṃ sahajakāya ityucyate |
T17n958u_001:4145: ....sa ca kālacakro bhagavān paramākṣaraḥ sukhapadam | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 69)
T17n958u_001:4147: sarvadhātūnāṃ samāhāro melāpakaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara iti | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 26)
T17n958u_001:4148: bāhyānāmaudārikāṇāmadhyātmagataṃ yo yogī niścinuyāt tat teṣāṃ saṃvaram,
T17n958u_001:4155: sādṛśyaṃ yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati |
T17n958u_001:4158: tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 32-33)
T17n958u_001:4163: sādhuno nairātmyasya tatra vidyamānatvāt | (vi. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 28)
T17n958u_001:4165: dhātusāmyasya śleṣmaṇo vahanāt sāmānyā guhye | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:4169: svedotpādaḥ samāpattau sarvatra siddhaḥ. tadvāhitvāt siddhā jaṅghayoḥ,
T17n958u_001:4170: siddhanimittotpādanaṃ prati vā tadadhikārāt | (va. ti., ṭī., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:4183: pādāpṛṣṭhādaṅguṣṭhe bodhicittasya spandanāt sindhuḥ pādapṛṣtham | (va. ti. ṭī. pṛ 34)
T17n958u_001:4184: sindhau mahābalā khyātā saśokā cāśruvāhinī | (va. ti., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:4188: sukhaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ tattvaṃ devānāṃ rāgiṇāṃ smṛtam |
T17n958u_001:4197: candrakairiva saṃchannaṃ vastubhirvedyate jinaiḥ || (se. ṭī., pṛ. 58-59)
T17n958u_001:4198: sukhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ pītaṃ sukhaṃ raktaṃ sukhaṃ sitam |
T17n958u_001:4199: sukhaṃ śyāmaṃ sukhaṃ nīlaṃ sukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ carācaram ||
T17n958u_001:4200: sukhaṃ prajñā sukhopāyaḥ sukhaṃ kundurujaṃ tathā |
T17n958u_001:4201: sukhaṃ bhāvaḥ sukhābhāvo vajrasattvaḥ sukhaḥ smṛtaḥ || (he. 2.2.32-33)
T17n958u_001:4212: śītānadyuttare ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmaśambhalamahāviṣayādhipatirdevāsuranāganirmāṇakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtairmahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhirnamaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvasattvabhāṣāntaraistathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvena sarvatathāgataśrotṛtvāt ṣoḍaśakalāvaraṇaprahāṇyā candravimalaprabhātvācca śobhanaścāsau candraśceti sucandro guhyādhipatirāḍhakavatīnivāsī śrīvajrapāṇiḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 1)
T17n958u_001:4226: kathaṃ sambhalaviṣayakalāpagrāmamādhipateḥ sūryaprabhasya vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakaḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 22, 24)
T17n958u_001:4235: śobhanaṃ tarpaṇaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā subhadrā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:4238: kheṭena yogināṃ saumanasyajananāt sumanāḥ pādapṛṣṭhe | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:4244: surāṇāṃ snāyūnāṃ vairī vāmakarṇāt pravartakaḥ surāvairī | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:4246: suvarṇasya susitatviṣaścittasya dvīpamiva dvīpaṃ jaṅghādvayamevaitat | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 34)
T17n958u_001:4247: jaṅghādvayaṃ tu vikhyātaṃ suvarṇadvīpasaṃjñakam | (va. ti., pṛ. 35)
T17n958u_001:4249: samākulā sudīptāṅgī matā sā cakravarmiṇī || (va. ti., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:4251: suṣṭhu virādakārāt prabhavatīti suvīrā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 48)
T17n958u_001:4254: keśaromṇāṃ susūkṣmāṇāṃ vahanāt sūkṣmarūpā śikhāyām | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 44)
T17n958u_001:4263: atreḍāpiṅgalāsuṣumnānāmadhipatiḥ prāṇaḥ sūryo nābherūrdhvaṃ pravāhataḥ | (vi. pra., pṛ. 196)
T17n958u_001:4265: nābherūrdhvaṃ tu yā nāḍī vahatyūrdhvamukhī tathā |
T17n958u_001:4266: kaṇṭhamadhye tu viśrāntā raktavahā prakīrtitā || (va. ti., pṛ. 80)
T17n958u_001:4268: sā ūrdhvamukhī nābherārabhya kaṇṭhaṃ yāvad raktaṃ vahati | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 80)
T17n958u_001:4270: sicyate kāyādikaṃ nirmalaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ kriyate'neneti sekaḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 2-3)
T17n958u_001:4278: vyākaroti svayaṃ śāstā eṣa sekavidhiṃ svayam |
T17n958u_001:4279: ācāryo nāvamantavyaḥ sugatājñāṃ na laṅghayet || iti (se. ṭī., pṛ. 27)
T17n958u_001:4280: evamekādaśo'bhiṣekaḥ pradhānastattvavajraprayogeṇeti bhagavato viṣpaṣṭavacanāccaturtho vaikādaśo vā'bhiṣekaḥ pṛthag nāvagantavyo vidvadbhiriti | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 28)
T17n958u_001:4281: yathāsaṃkhyameṣāṃ kumbhādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ sānvayāni kṣarākṣaraspandanispandākhyāni nāmāni |
T17n958u_001:4283: ...caturdaloṣṇīṣapadmāt śukrāmṛtadhārāyāḥ ṣoḍaśadalalalāṭe kamalakarṇikāyāmāgamanena yat kāyānanda-vāgānanda-cittānanda-jñānānandātmakaṃ sukhānubhavanaṃ tad bālam |
T17n958u_001:4287: tato gāḍhoddolanena spandaṃ gata iti catuḥṣaṣṭidalanābhikamaladvātriṃśaddalaguhyakamalāgamanena śukrendoḥ pañcadaśakamalasyāgragasvacchadravasya spandākhyasya vajramaṇisuṣiraparyantāgamanena yadadhimātraṃ kāyaviramānanda-vāgviramānanda-cittaviramānanda-jñānaviramānandātmakaṃ sukhānubhavanaṃ sa vṛddhaḥ prajñājñānābhiṣekaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4289: tasyāḥ svarasabāhyabhāvanākhyānurāgājjātaṃ nispandata iti niruddho vajramaṇerbāhyaspando bhage'cyutasukhatayā yasya candrāmṛtasya sa kāyasahajānanda-vāksahajānanda-cittasahajānanda-jñānasahajānandātmako mahājñānākhyaścaturthaḥ sekaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4290: asau nirāvaraṇalokottarajñānādhigataḥ siddharasavat tāmrādidhātūnāṃ svarṇabhāveneva sāvaraṇaskandhadhātvādīnāṃ pañcatathāgatapañcadevatādirpajābhāvena niṣpādakatvāt prajāpatiḥ | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 28)
T17n958u_001:4291: bāhyavāriṇeva bāhyamalasya avidyāmalakṣālanāya sicyate'neneti sekaḥ | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 36)
T17n958u_001:4295: sicyate snāpyate'nena sekastenābhidhīyate || (2.3.12) (he. ta. ṭī., pa. 7a) sekā
T17n958u_001:4297: siñcati hṛdayān sudhāraseneti sekā bāhumūladvaye | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 44) sevā
T17n958u_001:4300: sevyate mumukṣubhirabhyasyata iti sevā | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 116)
T17n958u_001:4302: tena sevā kāryā | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 120)
T17n958u_001:4310: saurāṣṭre lohitākhyā tu śaūṇdinī ḍākinī matā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 46)
T17n958u_001:4312: stambho nāma devatāveśāt pūrvaṃ pātrasya prākṛtāhaṅkāramapanīya stimitabhāvena kāṣṭhavat sthityavasthā stambhanam | (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 171)
T17n958u_001:4316: sthaviro yo daśavarṣopapannaḥ | (do. ko. vyā., pṛ. 84)
T17n958u_001:4324: mantradarśane tu svasaṃvidrūpā ḍākinyaḥ kāyādīnāṃ dharmatārūpā jñeyāḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 52-53)
T17n958u_001:4326: sruvaṃ tu rasanākhyātā hṛccandro lalanātmakaḥ | (va. ti., pṛ. 67)
T17n958u_001:4327: vāmadakṣiṇage lalanārasane adhodravyavāhitvātvād yathākramaṃ sruksruvau jñeyau | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 67)
T17n958u_001:4329: svabhāvaścaivā[nā]dyanutpannaṃ na satyaṃ na mṛṣeti ca |
T17n958u_001:4335: amī dharmāstu nirvāṇaṃ mohāt saṃsārarūpiṇaḥ | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 26-27)
T17n958u_001:4337: dvātriṃśattu dalaṃ padmaṃ mūrdhni madhye vyavasthitam | (va. ti., pṛ. 78)
T17n958u_001:4344: svādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 40)
T17n958u_001:4346: svādhiṣṭhānaṃ śūnye traidhātukadarśanaṃ nāma | (vi. pra., pṛ. 7)
T17n958u_001:4351: iha yadā pratyāhārādibhirbimbe dṛṣṭe satyapyakṣarakṣaṇaṃ notpadyate'yantritaprāṇatayā tadā nādābhyāsāddhaṭhena prāṇaṃ madhyamāyāṃ vāhayitvā prajñābjagatakuliśamaṇau bodhicittabindunirodhādakṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayenniṣpandeneti haṭhayogaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4354: hayavaddakṣiṇakarṇena nirgacchatīti hayakarṇā | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 47)
T17n958u_001:4357: urubhyāṃ balavato raktasya pravartanād hayagrīvaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 49)
T17n958u_001:4359: ṣaḍ viṣayān bhavagrahān harati khaṇḍayatīti hariṇī |
T17n958u_001:4360: sandhyābhāṣayā saiva jñānamudrā | (ca. ko. vyā., pṛ. 21)
T17n958u_001:4364: tadeva candrājyahaviṣa ādhārabhūtatvāddhavirbhājanaṃ nānyat | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 34)
T17n958u_001:4365: sīmāntamadhyagā cāpi himālaye khagānanā | (va. ti., pṛ. 45)
T17n958u_001:4370: a iti apratiṣṭhitasarvadharma iti | (a. va. saṃ., pṛ. 37)
T17n958u_001:4373: tadātmakāyavākcitto hṛdvajro'sau mahāsukhaḥ || (gu. sa. pra., pṛ. 13)
T17n958u_001:4375: sīmanto varaṭakamadhyastadvāhitvād hṛṣṭavadanāt karasparśāt prajñopāyayoḥ sānandanandanatvānmeḍhre | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 45)
T17n958u_001:4377: gātrapuṣṭau meda eva hetustadvahanāddhetudāyikā pādāṅgulīṣu | (va. ti. ṭī., 46)
T17n958u_001:4387: rūpaṃ sahajātmakamasyāstīti sarvarūpī vyāpako yaḥ sa śrīheruko bhagavān ṣaṣṭho mahāvajradharaḥ,
T17n958u_001:4388: dharmatāsvabhāvo vijñeya iti śeṣaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 15)
T17n958u_001:4391: skandhadhātvādibuddhānāṃ stūpa ityabhidhīyate || (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 19)
T17n958u_001:4393: eṣa śrīheruko vīro vasantatilakā smṛtā | (va. ti., pṛ. 38)
T17n958u_001:4394: tatra nirmāṇacakre nābhau sa eva vasanto'kāro hrasvarūpaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4396: saṃbhogacakre kaṇṭhe sa eva trimātraḥ plutaḥ praṇavarūpaḥ |
T17n958u_001:4399: tadeva vilomena śiraḥkaṇṭhahṛdayanābhirūpaḥ śrīheruko mantramūrtiḥ | (va. ti.ṭī., pṛ. 38-39)
T17n958u_001:4400: pādāṅgulibhyo'bhedyahūkārarūpasya medasaḥ pravartakatvāt śrīherukaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 49)
T17n958u_001:4401: kāyatrayasvabhāvo bhagavān śrīherukaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 86)
T17n958u_001:4403: hekāreṇa mahākaruṇā vajraṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate |
T17n958u_001:4408: prajñāgnau caṇḍālījvalanatīkṣṇatvāt dāhojjvale homo'sau vijñeyaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 66)
T17n958u_001:4410: havibhiḥ kriyate homaḥ prajñāgnau tu mahojjvale || (va. ti., pṛ. 66-67) @-------*********--------
